abstrac: Wordpress Web Development | SEO/SMM | Graphic Designing
bio:
Welcome to Bilal's Profile 🙂

🔰 After helping many clients by developing websites and fixing issues 🛠 I figured out that what holds most business owners back is not a lack of skill or integrity, but a shortage of quality people to serve.

🔰 I FOCUS on 1 GOAL 🎯

That is to help my clients GROW their online presence and INCREASE their REVENUES 📈 through the means of the most efficient and highly-converting websites and best-converting SEO practices.

Message me NOW to see how my expertise can work for you. 📩

🔰 I am merging my technical and managerial acumen to yield a synergistic effort to carry guaranteed work to my clients on committed time. I am running an agency where my team of professionals has excellent skills in the following areas:

🔰 Website Design & Development

I can provide you with eye-catchy, secure, fast, and device-size optimized websites ranging from a simple one-pager business website to a Multivendor eCommerce store or a Learning Management System having hundreds of students, instructors, courses, and quizzes.
Technologies I use are WordPress, PHP, .NET core, HTML, CSS, ReactJS, and Laravel.

🔰 Search Engine Optimization (SEO)

As the first step of your online growth, You will be provided with a free website audit. Feel free to share your website link. Then I will have a FREE 30-minute CONSULTATION CALL with you.

- Free Website Audit
- Free Consultaion Call
- SEO Plan & Strategy
- Keyword Research
- Competitors Analysis
- PPC Campaigns & Social Media Handling
- Customers & Sales Acquisition
- Content Pages Design

🔰 Graphics Designing
- Branding
- Product Label
- Logo
- Product Box

🔰 Multiple amendments are applied during the completion process of a project until the client does not approve and every project is delivered on the payback guarantee because my client’s satisfaction comes first to my team and me.

🔰 Message me NOW to see how my expertise can work for you. 📩

For quick chat/call you can what's app me at +92 304 13 99 106

To get started: Share complete details of your tasks/project. 
We can work together on finalizing your project requirements and milestones. 

Communication Channel: guru.com - Skype - Zoom - Email - Whats App - Trello

Payment: Only through Guru.com

25% Advance on the signing of a contract
30% Midway Milestone
45% on final Delivery

bio:
I'm a developer who knows the value of time, works very hard, and always provides work on time, and prove myself with great skills.
I always think that when both clients and developers trust each other, the project can succeed, and also think that if an excellent developer, has to own wide-knowledge.
My skills will be updated go on and I will try to prepare myself to become a top developer continuously.

My Primary Tech is the following:

- Front-End Frameworks and Libraries (Angular, React.js, Vue.js, D3 js, Bootstrap, CSS3/SCSS/LESS)
- Native & Hybrid Mobile development(Android, Swift, Ionic, Flutter)
- Java , C++ ,C#
- Backend & API Development for WebSite and Mobile backend (Php Frameworks, Node, Rest Api, GraphQL, Python, Django, Laravel, Codeigniter)
- Blockchain/Smart-Contracts (Solidity, Truffle framework)/Token Development
- Website Development, Ecommerce(Php, MEAN, WordPress, Shopify
- Strong Server and database management (Almost all Hosting Servers such as [AWS, Azure, Godaddy, hosting ...], MySQL, MongoDB, Firebase, MSS)
- Project Management and Integration (Git, Github, Bitbucket)
